# Test fixtures: ReefBeat device manifests

These JSON/XML fixture trees (under the subfolders in this directory) are used by this repository's test suite to simulate ReefBeat devices.

## Source

These fixtures were copied from the upstream simulator repository:

- Repo: <https://github.com/roblandry/reefbeat-devices-simulator>
- Commit: 30398ae89502d656b0374b94177e85d2f37bc326
- Retrieved: 2026-01-18

## Updating

If you refresh these fixtures from upstream, please update the commit SHA above so we can reproduce the exact upstream snapshot used for tests.

## Licensing / attribution

This file records provenance for the copied fixture data. Please also ensure the upstream repository's license allows redistribution of the copied fixture content (and comply with any notice requirements).
